issue.title: e.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

issue.title: VIP过滤器
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

网站上可能会有部分提示登陆的内容。过滤它们，但不过滤网站预设好的常规登录渠道。请看图片，截图来源于iqiyi.com，我使用黄色的笔圈出来的内容不要过滤，但是过滤红笔圈出来的内容
![Uploading 意见.png…]()


### Proposed solution

创建一个过滤器，拦截有关于登陆的类似内容，但是千万不要过滤网站预设的登录窗口

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
> it promotes persianblocker.

Only users who have the list enabled will see that.
Because the site is being update daily, users might get into problems if their list is outdated (@zloyden said AdGuard updates the lists after 4 days).

issue.title: www.eurocontrol.int
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.eurocontrol.int/info/privacy-and-website-terms-use](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.eurocontrol.int%2Finfo%2Fprivacy-and-website-terms-use) ### Comment > When I click on the "Give my consent" button, it visually changes as expected (to "Withdraw my consent"). However, in reality it generates a console error and the change in settings is not saved. Consequently, if I then click on "Withdraw my consent", the button doesn't change back because there's just another console error and no settings change. If I refresh the page, naturally, we're back to the initial state ("Give my consent") because the change in settings was never saved. ### Screenshots
